images.copyright: Pantropical spotted dolphins off the coast of Ixtapa, Mexico (© Christian Vizl/Tandem Stills + Motion)
images.title: A day for dolphins
images.caption: A day for dolphins
images.desc: We're celebrating World Dolphin Day with a small pod of pantropical spotted dolphins. Award-winning photographer Christian Vizl captured this serene scene off the coast of Ixtapa, Mexico, where these beautiful creatures can be, er, spotted in abundance. As their name suggests, pantropical spotted dolphins live in tropical and subtropical waters around the world.
